summary.para: The DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO structure describes information about the cursor shape.

remarks.para: An application draws the cursor shape with the top-left-hand corner drawn at the position that the Position member of the structure specifies; the application does not use the hot spot to draw the cursor shape.
An application calls the method to retrieve cursor shape information in a DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_SHAPE_INFO structure.

summary.para: A -typed value that specifies the type of cursor shape.
The width in pixels of the mouse cursor.
The height in scan lines of the mouse cursor.
The width in bytes of the mouse cursor.
The position of the cursor's hot spot relative to its upper-left pixel. An application does not use the hot spot when it determines where to draw the cursor shape.
